connector.description: Receive data from an SFTP server.

camel.kamelet.sftp-source.connectionHost.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-source.connectionHost
camel.kamelet.sftp-source.connectionHost.description: The hostname of the SFTP server.

camel.kamelet.sftp-source.connectionPort.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-source.connectionPort
camel.kamelet.sftp-source.connectionPort.description: The port of the FTP server.

camel.kamelet.sftp-source.username.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-source.username
camel.kamelet.sftp-source.username.description: The username to access the SFTP server.

camel.kamelet.sftp-source.password.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-source.password
camel.kamelet.sftp-source.password.description: The password to access the SFTP server.

camel.kamelet.sftp-source.recursive.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-source.recursive
camel.kamelet.sftp-source.recursive.description: If a directory, look for files in all sub-directories as well.

camel.kamelet.sftp-source.ignoreFileNotF.name: camel.kamelet.sftp-source.ignoreFileNotFoundOrPermissionError
camel.kamelet.sftp-source.ignoreFileNotF.description: Whether to ignore when (trying to list files in directories or when downloading a file), which does not exist or due to permission error. By default when a directory or file does not exists or insufficient permission, then an exception is thrown. Setting this option to true allows to ignore that instead.
